# Memphis

## Col1

### Population

```{r}
acs <- read_csv("_data/acs.csv")
```

```{r}
gg <- ggplot(acs, aes(x = year, y = estimate)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = unique(acs$year)) +
  labs(title = "Population in Memphis, 2010-2019",
       y = "Estimate",
       x = "Year",
       color = "Dataset") +
  theme_light()

ggplotly(gg)
```
